item.description: Amazon API Gateway VS. Express Gateway If you’re curious about how your API Gateway stacks up, now’s the time to listen up because we’re breaking down the differences (and similarities) of the most popular projects for the API Gateway use case. First up, we’ve got Amazon API Gateway and we’re going to compare it toExpress Gateway, an open source API Gateway built entirely on Express.js.   TLDR: You can skip ahead to the deep dive.
